description:
Advanced Journalistic Writing. How to write profiles personal pieces, and third-personal observational pieces, in ways that hook the average reader with strong emphasis on the best journalistic fact-gathering methods, including the cultivation of sources, interviewing techniques, and the proper use of secondary material in the Internet age. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: Advanced Journalistic Writing:  Science, Technology, Society

section.name: Advanced Journalistic Writing:  Science, Technology, Society
